summary: This document is a chain of emails from January 2020 between personnel at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) regarding travel arrangements for an international trip to Stockholm, Sweden, for an interview related to the Epstein investigation (case 2018R01618). The emails detail frustrations over booking refundable flights and scheduling, and reference several prior domestic trips for the same investigation.

connections.description: Professional colleagues within the U.S. Attorney's Office (SDNY) coordinating travel for the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Planned travel to Stockholm for interview
events.description: SDNY team plans to travel from JFK to Stockholm, Sweden, via Paris, for an interview related to the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Scheduled interview in Stockholm
events.description: Reference to an interview being scheduled near Stockholm, Sweden, for January 29th and/or 30th, 2020, as part of the Epstein investigation.

events.title: Interview in Los Angeles
events.description: Prior travel for the Epstein investigation team to Los Angeles for an interview on December 16 and/or 17, 2019.

events.title: Interview in Los Angeles
events.description: Prior travel for the Epstein investigation team to Los Angeles for an interview on November 14, 2019.

events.title: Interview in West Palm Beach
events.description: Prior travel for the Epstein investigation team to West Palm Beach for an interview on November 4, 2019.

events.title: Victim interview in Los Angeles
events.description: Prior travel for the Epstein investigation team to Los Angeles for a victim interview in June 2019.

events.title: Meetings and interviews in West Palm Beach
events.description: Prior travel for the Epstein investigation team to West Palm Beach, Florida, for meetings and interviews in May 2019.

events.title: Travel request for West Palm Beach
events.description: Travel request approved for the Epstein investigation team to travel to West Palm Beach, Florida, for meetings and interviews.

events.title: Initial travel request for Epstein investigation
events.description: Initial travel request for United States v. Epstein, 2018R01618, for meetings and interviews in West Palm Beach and/or Fort Lauderdale, Florida.

keyFacts: The U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York (SDNY) was actively investigating the Epstein case (2018R01618) in early 2020, planning an international interview in Stockholm, Sweden.
Travel for the investigation required fully refundable international flight tickets due to government policy, causing scheduling conflicts and communication issues between staff.
The document references multiple prior domestic trips for the Epstein investigation to Los Angeles and West Palm Beach/Fort Lauderdale for victim interviews and meetings throughout 2019.
The case is formally referenced as 'United States v. Epstein, 2018R01618, an investigation relating to enticement of minors for sexual activity.'
